code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GuessNumber=()=>{const[secretNumber,setSecretNumber]=useState(generateRandomNumber());const[guess,setGuess]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');function generateRandomNumber(){return Math.floor(Math.random()*100)+1;}const handleInputChange=event=>{setGuess(event.target.value);};const handleGuess=()=>{const guessedNumber=parseInt(guess,10);if(isNaN(guessedNumber)){setMessage('Введите число!');}else if(guessedNumber===secretNumber){setMessage("\u041F\u043E\u0437\u0434\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043B\u044F\u0435\u043C!
